thread.title: Asus ZenFone 2 Laser smartphone launched in India priced at Rs 9,999
thread.title_full: Asus ZenFone 2 Laser smartphone launched in India priced at Rs 9,999 | The Financial Express

author: financialexpress.com
title: Asus ZenFone 2 Laser smartphone launched in India priced at Rs 9,999
text:
AT ITS ZenFestival event in New Delhi recently, Asus launched its new smartphone ZenFone 2 Laser. The ZenFone 2 priced at Rs 9,999. Laser has been launched in three variants—the ZenFone 2 Laser (ZE550KL) with 2GB of RAM and Snapdragon 410; the ZenFone 2 Laser (ZE550KL) with 3GB of RAM and Snapdragon 615 at R13,999; and the ZenFone 2 Laser (ZE601KL) at R17,999.
The ZenFone 2 Laser (ZE550KL) features a 5.5-inch HD (720×1280 pixels) IPS display, comes with 16GB of built-in storage that’s expandable via microSD card (up to 128GB), and 3000mAh battery. It also sports a 13-megapixel rear camera with laser autofocus, and a 5-megapixel front camera.
The ZenFone 2 Laser (ZE601KL) features a 6-inch full-HD (1080×1920 pixels) IPS display, is powered by a Snapdragon 615 SoC, comes with 16GB of built-in storage that’s expandable via microSD card (up to 128GB), and 3000mAh battery. It also sports a 13-megapixel rear camera with laser autofocus, and a 5-megapixel front camera.
First Published on August 30, 2015 12:06 am
